Référence de la classe SameOrganizerForAllComponentsException SameOrganizerForAllComponentsException Graphe d'héritage de SameOrganizerForAllComponentsException:
Graphe de collaboration de SameOrganizerForAllComponentsException:
Description détaillée
SameOrganizerForAllComponentsException.
This exception is emitted when an event is encountered with more than one component (e.g.: exceptions), but the organizer is not identical in every component.
